TypeSignature.Value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract IInputSession implements class System.ServiceModel.Channels.ISession

remarks.para: On the other side of the message interchange, the interface represents an outgoing implemented on the sending side of a one-way communication between messaging endpoints. Note these two sessions are distinct.

summary.para: Defines the interface for the session implemented on the receiving side of a one-way communication between messaging endpoints.
